findings.lower_thorax: Lung bases are clear. Heart size is normal.
findings.liver: Moderate to severe patent steatosis with a fat fraction of 22%. No focal hepatic lesions.
findings.biliary: Gallbladder is surgically absent. No intra or extrahepatic biliary duct dilation. Calcification in cystic duct remnant.
findings.pancreas: Atrophic pancreas with low T1 signal progressive enhancement. Mild irregularity of a non-dilated pancreatic duct with multiple ectatic side branches. Low signal intensity stranding adjacent to pancreatic tail, significantly improved compared to prior CT.
findings.spleen: Normal in size and signal intensity.
findings.adrenal_glands: Unremarkable right and left adrenal glands.
findings.kidneys: Symmetric in size without focal lesion. No hydronephrosis.
findings.gastrointestinal_tract: Postsurgical changes from Roux-en-Y gastric bypass. No bowel obstruction.
findings.lymph_nodes: Prominent porta hepatic lymph node measuring 0.9 cm is unchanged.
findings.vasculature: No abdominal aortic aneurysm. Replaced left hepatic artery. Portal vein is patent. Splenic vein is attenuated and likely chronically thrombosed.
findings.osseous_and_soft_tissue_structures: No worrisome bony lesion. Fat-containing umbilical hernia.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Low signal intensity stranding adjacent to pancreatic tail has significantly improved compared to prior CT and represents chronic sequela of prior conditions.
